title: How to Make a Raspberry Mango Mixed Drink

steps.headline: Pour the frozen raspberries into a blender.
Pour the lime juice into the blender.
Pour the tequila into the blender.
Pour the raspberry liquor into the blender.
Dump the sugar into the blender.
Dump the ice into the blender.
Pulse until the mix comes out smooth.
Pour into a large container.
Wash out the blender.
Dump the mangoes into the washed out blender.
Pour the lime juice into the blender.
Pour the tequila into the blender.
Pour the triple sec into the blender.
Dump the sugar into the blender.
Dump the ice into the blender.
Pulse until the mix comes out smooth.
Fill each glass with half of the raspberry mix.
Top off each glass with half of the mango mix.
Stir a bit to get a blended flavor.
Serve as soon as possible.

text: Making the Raspberry Mix Pour the frozen raspberries into a blender.  Pour the lime juice into the blender.  Pour the tequila into the blender.  Pour the raspberry liquor into the blender.  Dump the sugar into the blender.  Dump the ice into the blender.  Pulse until the mix comes out smooth.  Pour into a large container.  Wash out the blender.  Making the Mango Mix Dump the mangoes into the washed out blender.  Pour the lime juice into the blender.  Pour the tequila into the blender.  Pour the triple sec into the blender.  Dump the sugar into the blender.  Dump the ice into the blender.  Pulse until the mix comes out smooth.  Making the Mixed Drink Fill each glass with half of the raspberry mix.  Top off each glass with half of the mango mix.  Stir a bit to get a blended flavor.  Serve as soon as possible.
